mapper.select:
SELECT c.id, c.name, c.value, d.dic_name as dicName, d.dic_value as dicValue, d.dic_type as dicType, c.create_time as createTime, c.update_time as updateTime FROM tab_category c left join sys_dic d on d.id = c.type_id WHERE 1=1
and (name like CONCAT('%',#{searchValue},'%') or UPPER(value) like UPPER(CONCAT('%',#{value},'%')) )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tab_category (id, name, value, type_id, create_time) VALUES (#{id}, #{name}, #{value}, #{typeId}, #{createTime});
